name: Exilium Demo
description:
A demo of a wip dungeon game called exilium.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to walk around, click to shoot or use your selected item. Your inventory is at the top left, change your selected item by scrolling.

Find the golden key and exit room to move to the next floor, a couple of floors down there is a boss demo fight :)

Please report bugs / feedback here, at @5mixer or at tinyurl.com/exilium1. That's the point of the demo! :) Chrome seems to work best - firefox has some GC issues that I'll need to fix up.
